pageTitle: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist Trophy Guide - PS3 Trophies Forum
textBeforeTable: For this trophy you need to Master the Ghost Style. You get points in Ghost for knocking people out but you get MORE points for leaving enemies untouched. Master Ghost playstyle on 7 missions Tactical Style: Ghost [hide][top] Select Plane Upgrades and then you have to upgrade all of the Paladin to the maximum level. After you have done that the trophy will pop! Grim Missions - Solo/Coop Back Plane Upgrades To upgrade the Paladin you need talk to Grim. When Sam and Grim have finished their dialouge you will have 3 options: Fully upgrade your headquarters C&C Optimized [hide][top]
textAfterTable: VERY IMPORTANT NOTE: When going for the Ghost, Panther and Assault mastery trophies go for ONE at a time. Because If you get Master Ghost on a level then replay it and get Master Panther then you will wipe your Ghost. So BE CAREFUL! [hide][top] Tactical Style: Panther Master Panther playstyle on 7 missions See Tactical Style: Ghost [hide][top] Tactical Style: Assault Master Assault playstyle on 7 missions See Tactical Style: Ghost [hide][top]
